title: Shielding Connie
description: DaxOne night with Connie wasn’t enough. I craved more from the sexy lawyer, but I ruined any chance I had when I walked away. After seeing her again, I know what a huge mistake I made.But the timing isn’t right. I have a mission to find my sister’s kidnapper and make him pay.ConnieMorgan Thompson Security, the company Dax works for, is being sued and I’ve been asked to defend them. Career-wise, it’s an opportunity I can’t refuse.Unfortunately, the moment I see Dax, my anger towards him returns. If I had known he was a player, I wouldn’t have wasted my time.To my surprise, I see his softer side emerging as he struggles over his missing sister. Somehow, it reminds me of the man he was during our night together. I can't help but wonder if I judged him too quickly? Was there more to his abrupt vanishing act than he let on?Join the men of Morgan Thompson Security for an action packed romantic suspense. You will also find three of Susan Stoker's characters, Bubba, Gumby, and Tex included too.
author: Danielle Pays
